name: Marble Blast Ultra
notes:
This is a dx9 game
Multiplayer untested.

FPS speed ranking:
gallium-nine > wine+esync > wine
d9vk, dxup, etc. untested

task.name: wineexec
task.description:
Installing Marble Blast Ultra
------------------------------
Make sure to uncheck final launch toggle.

content:
files:
- setup:
    filename: MarbleBlastUltra-1.9.1.5_setup.exe
    url: http://old.marblevortex.com/download/MarbleBlastUltra-1.9.1.5_setup.exe
game:
  arch: win32
  exe: drive_c/Program Files/Marble Blast Ultra/marbleblast.exe
  prefix: $GAMEDIR
installer:
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: Creating 32bit Wine prefix.
    name: create_prefix
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
- task:
    arch: win32
    description: 'Installing Marble Blast Ultra

      ------------------------------

      Make sure to uncheck final launch toggle.'
    executable: setup
    name: wineexec
- task:
    name: winekill
    prefix: $GAMEDIR
system:
  pulse_latency: true
wine:
  Desktop: true
  esync: true
